attributes.action: protect under 18 year old Performing Arts college students from performing inappropriate scenes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students who are in college studying Performing Arts are required to do many plays/shows a year. The last 2 years at a local college, these plays have been of an adult nature and females below the age of 18 are required to dress and perform inappropriately whilst being classed as a minor. The tutors should think of more decent shows, I'm sure the parents who watch them aren't happy to see their 16 year old daughter in a skimpy corset.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
